original_text: But all the people were listening to him very carefully. They wanted to hear everything that he was saying. So those leaders did not know how they could kill him.
korean_text: 백성이 다 그에게 귀를 기울여 들으므로 어찌할 방도를 찾지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: But all the people were listening to him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 모든 사람들이 그에게 귀를 기울이고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: So those leaders did not know
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 지도者们은 알지 못했습니다
